title: Welcome to My Journey

sections.content: I'm Austin Walker, a technical product manager specializing in healthcare platforms. Over the past three years, I've built telehealth SaaS systems that process real prescriptions, serve real patients, and navigate real regulatory complexity.

sections.title: Fair Warning
sections.content: This isn't a generic PM portfolio. It's detailed, technical, and healthcare-focused. If you're looking for surface-level feature lists, this isn't it. If you want to understand how technical PMs approach complex problems, keep reading.
